testCases.setupSql: CREATE TABLE persons(person_id INT, first_name TEXT, last_name TEXT); CREATE TABLE addresses(address_id INT, person_id INT, city TEXT, state TEXT); INSERT INTO persons VALUES (1,'Allen','Wang'),(2,'Bob','Alice'); INSERT INTO addresses VALUES (1,2,'NYC','NY');
testCases.solutionSql: SELECT p.first_name, p.last_name, a.city, a.state FROM persons p LEFT JOIN addresses a ON p.person_id = a.person_id;
